3D Sound Visualizer

Emmett Butler and David Coss

Summary

This is a 3D visualizer for audio files.

Usage

	Visualizer <soundfile> -w windowtype -r -c
		soundfile : the file to be played
		-w : the windowing function for the waveform (see below)
		-r : enable mouse rotation
		-c : enable flashing colours

<soundfile> must be a mono or stereo audio file. Supported formats include:

  • WAV
  • AIFF
  • FLAC

For a list of file formats that are compatible with libsndfile but are untested with this program, see the libsndfile documentation.
